column2: Latest; Stung Treng: According to preliminary reports
column3: an explosion in the air caused metal objects to fall from the sky at 6 am on May 23
column7: around 4 km from the Laotian border.------According to the border police
column8: there were many pieces of metal falling from the sky to the ground.  The explosion is suspected of being a large type of drone which detonated for an unknown reason.------Lots more photos: ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/849125.html------A ------similar incident------ occurred last October in Preah Vihear.
